detail_desc: Trainer socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves, buttons down the front, ribbing around the cuffs and hem and short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Knee-length dress in woven fabric with a round neckline and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Yoke with a pleat at the back, and long balloon sleeves with narrow cuffs.
Parka in a woven modal blend with a soft, brushed finish. Hood, diagonal zip down the front, side pockets and a drawstring at the waist. Long sleeves with a tab and press-stud. Unlined.
Short shorts in woven fabric with a zip fly and button, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.

5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs. Shaping – denim with a stretch function that holds in and shapes the waist, thighs and bum while keeping the jeans in shape.
Short jumper in an airy rib knit with a boat neck, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with embroidered details. Narrow elastication and a small frill at the cuffs and hem.
V-neck tunic in an airy weave with a stand-up collar, buttons down the front, a gathered yoke at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Short-sleeved cotton piqué top with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidered detail on the chest and narrow ribbing at the cuffs.
Sleeveless top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a double-layered drawstring hood and a kangaroo pocket.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Short-sleeved top with a rounded hem. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Microfibre hipster briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Short shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Long-sleeved jumper in a fine-knit viscose blend with a round neck and decorative bow at the top. Ribbing around the neckline and hem.
T-shirt in jersey with a motif.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Straight-style, calf-length dress in a soft knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Sandals in imitation leather made from Vegea™ and water-based polyurethane. Square toes, gathered foot straps and narrow tie straps. The tie straps have decorative metal pendants with faceted glass rhinestones. Thermoplastic rubber soles. Heel approx. 9 cm. VEGEA™ is an innovative, leather-like vegan material made from bio-waste produced during the winemaking process.

Short-sleeved shirt in a spotted premium cotton weave with a turn-down collar, French front and rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Linen joggers with a regular, elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, a fake back pocket and tapered legs.
Short-sleeved nightdress in glitter-patterned cotton jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Short-sleeved shirt in a softly draping, patterned viscose and cotton weave with a turn-down collar, French front, yoke at the back and rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Leggings in glossy, patterned jersey with an elasticated waist.
Shirt in a viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Chest pocket and long sleeves with narrow buttoned cuffs. Gently rounded hem.
Dress in woven fabric with buttons at the back, a gathered yoke and a frill trim around the armholes. Unlined.
Large sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Top in soft faux shearling with a high collar, zip at the top, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Rounded hem with short slits in the sides.
Thin tights with a floral pattern, elasticated waist and reinforced toes.
T-shirt in soft viscose jersey with a slight sheen. Narrow ribbed trim around the neckline.
A pair of patterned plastic earrings in the shape of a face. Length 6 cm.
Gently flared, sleeveless jersey tunic.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, wide sides and a high cut at the back.
Lace top with an integral jersey inner top and small stand-up collar. Long sleeves with a flounce at the cuffs, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and a flounce at the hem.
Playsuit in soft, patterned jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a gentle V-neck, elasticated seam at the waist and short legs. Lace trims around the top and hems.
Double-layered sports vest top in soft, fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back. Gathered side seams for best fit over the tummy.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft, cable-knit cotton blend containing some wool with a flounce over the shoulders, buttons at the back of the neck and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Short shorts in an airy weave with a high paper bag waist that is elasticated at the back and a detachable tie belt. Pleats at the top, side pockets and a zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners.
Fancy dress costume with a zip down the front, hood with appliqués and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Top in heavy jersey with a ribbed stand-up collar and zip at the top. Long raglan sleeves, diagonal welt side pockets, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

V-neck bra top in microfibre with a lined front, wide shoulder straps and padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Folded, glued edges at the top for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin and minimal visibility under clothes. No fasteners.

Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a button-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a sleeve placket with a link button. Rounded hem, slightly longer at the back.

Airy chiffon blouse in a relaxed fit with a collar, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Yoke at the back with decorative gathers and a seam at the hem with a wide flounce.
Sports top in fast-drying mesh with long sleeves, thumbholes at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.Slightly longer at the back. The top is made partly from recycled polyester.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with a padded edge and tongue, elasticated lacing at the front and an adjustable hook and loop tab. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a print motif and reversible sequins on the front. Jersey-lined, wrapover hood, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Washed cotton twill joggers in a relaxed style with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, welt back pockets, and slightly lower crotch. Tapered legs with decorative seams at the knees and elasticated hems. Regular fit.
Short dress in soft cotton jersey with long sleeves and a seam at the waist with narrow, concealed elastication. Deep neckline and a double-layered front for easier nursing access.
Straight-cut, double-breasted jacket in cotton twill with notch lapels, flap front pockets and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined.
Jacket in long-haired faux fur with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the front and discreet side pockets. Lined.
Jersey body with a low-cut neckline at the back and a small stand-up collar that fastens at the back of the neck with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners. Long sleeves and press-studs at the crotch.
Polo-neck jumper knitted in cotton with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Calf-length dress in an airy cotton weave with a round neckline, opening with a button at the back of the neck and long raglan balloon sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Relaxed fit with a gathered seam at the waist and a gathered tier for added width. Unlined.

Chinos in soft washed cotton twill with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly, side pockets and welt back pockets. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Blouse in airy linen. Wide neckline with narrow, covered elastication at the top and 3/4-length sleeves with gathers at the shoulders and elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.
Calf-length dress in a patterned weave with an opening and concealed button at the back of the neck. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a seam at the waist with smocked sections. Unlined.

Blouse in airy organza with a jacquard-weave pattern. Small, frilled collar, an opening and button at the back of the neck, short, voluminous puff sleeves and narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning. Lined with a V-neck top in jersey with adjustable shoulder straps. The top can be detached from the blouse.
Shorts in printed cotton jersey with an elasticated, frill-trimmed waist with a decorative bow, and side pockets.
Boys' briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined crotch.
Short-sleeved jersey nightdress with a print motif on the front.
Fitted body in soft cotton jersey with a boat neck, long sleeves and lined gusset with concealed press-studs.
Fitted top in soft, patterned jersey with short, flounced sleeves.
Leather belt with a metal buckle. Width 3.5 cm.

Shirt in a bleached cotton weave with patches, a turn-down collar, classic front and flap chest pockets with a button. Shoulder tabs with a button, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem with split seams.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with a wide lace trim at the top. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and 3/4-length trumpet sleeves.
Wide, high-waisted shorts woven in a cotton blend with wide elastication and a frill trim at the top.

Short, double-breasted coat in a felted, woven wool blend with wide notch lapels and concealed press-studs down the front. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, pockets in the side seams and an inner pocket with a button. Lined. The wool content of the coat is recycled.
Short, sleeveless dress in sturdy jersey with a low-cut back, seam at the waist and flared skirt. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Waist belt in grained imitation leather with a decorative metal ball chain along the edges and elastic and a metal buckle at the back.

Shirt in stretch denim with a detachable hood in sweatshirt fabric. The shirt is in a straight style with press-studs down the front, two chest pockets, one with a flap and press stud, and cuffs with a press-stud fastening. Slightly longer at the back.
All-in-one suit in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems, and press-studs on one shoulder, at the crotch and down the legs. Soft brushed inside.
Plastic bucket with a handle at the top.
Sleeveless maxi dress in soft jersey with an open chest pocket and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Double-breasted jacket in soft faux fur with notch lapels, dropped shoulders and side pockets. Lined.
Cardigan in a soft, textured knit. Relaxed fit with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the opening, cuffs and hem.

Non-wired push-up bra designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin. Padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
